stripped_text: When your turn begins, if there are 2 or more hosted power counters, remove all of them and suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented. Otherwise, place 1 power counter on this resource and gain click.
text: When your turn begins, if there are 2 or more hosted power counters, remove all of them and suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented. Otherwise, place 1 power counter on this resource and gain [click].
title: Stim Dealer
